summary: In the summer of 1991 an elderly woman Ghislaine Marchal is found murdered in the basement of her home with the message "Omar M'a Tuer" (Omar has kill me) written beside in her own blood. ... See full summary »
cast: Sami Bouajila|Denis Podalydès|Maurice Bénichou|Salomé Stévenin|Nozha Khouadra|Afida Tahri|Yanis Abdellaoui|Ayoub El Mahlili|Martial Rivol|Lounès Tazairt|Liliane Nataf|Catherine Salviat|Pascal Elso|Didier Vinson|Gabriel Le Doze|Pierre Laur|Pierre Brichese|Eric Kailey|Ludovic Berthillot|Julien Béramis|Catherine Lauverjon|Bunny Godillot|Jean Toscan|Pascale Danjou|Dominique Ratonnat|Benaïssa Ahaouari|Bader Nejmi|Michel Coste|Nacer Chenouf|Philippe Van Den Bergh|Shirley Bousquet|Pierre Alloggia|Ysé Tran|Éric Naggar|François Clavier|Hakim Taleb|Zakaria El Ahmadi|Allain Naron|Catherine de Seynes|Bernard di Mambro|Teddy Ricoul|Arbi Khemiri|Coralie Laurens|Didier Mahieu|Pascal Turmo|Clément Brun|Henri Cohen|Thierry Genovese|Rose Harlean|Omar Raddad
title: Omar m'a tuer
